com.al.lib
Class Library

java.lang.Object
  com.al.lib.Library

public class Library
extends java.lang.Object

Library is a Singleton Class Uses the Library class to provide the Library instance


Sample client code


        public class TestAMF extends Activity implements OnClickListener, RemoteListener 
        {
        public ArrayCollection resultarr;


        public void onCreate(Bundle savedInstanceState) 
        {
                super.onCreate(savedInstanceState);
                setContentView(R.layout.main);
                Button button = (Button) findViewById(R.id.sendButton);
                button.setOnClickListener(this);
        }

   
        public void onClick(View v) 
        {
                System.out.println(" button clicked");
                EditText username=(EditText) findViewById(R.id.username);
                EditText password=(EditText) findViewById(R.id.password);
                

                try
                {
                        /* Following statement returns library class instance used for in library validation and license verification
                        

                         Library library = Library.getInstance();
                        // Key value - key will be available once the user is a registered license user
                        // this      - current apllication context.   
                        library.initialize("Key Value", this);
                        

                        // Following statement returns AMFClientfactory instance used in creating an amfclient
                         and a normal or a secured channel for communication 
                        AMFClientFactory factory = AMFClientFactory.getInstance();
                        

                        // Parameters required for createAMFClient are fully qualified destination url and remote object
                        AMFClient client = factory.createAMFClient("http://sampleserver.com/TestRemoting", "messageBO");
                        

                        // Adds a listener for the client to be able to listen events that take place at the server. 
                        client.addRemoteListener(this);
                        

                        // Object array for parameter passing, according to the remote method requirement 
                        Object[] params = new Object[]{};
                        

                        // Calls the remote method with parameter as the object array
                        client.call("login", params);
                        

                }
                catch(LibraryInitException e)
                {
                        e.printStackTrace();
                }
        }
  
   
        // Invoked on successful remote procedure call.
        public void onResult(ResultEvent resultEvent)
        {
                System.out.println("success:" + resultEvent.getData());
        }
        

        // Invoked on remote procedure call failure.   
        public void onError(ErrorEvent errorEvent)
        {
                System.out.println("Error occured:" + errorEvent.getData());
        }
}

Method Summary

          Provides a Library Instance to the android application which can then call createAMFClient.

          Validates and Initializes the Key and the current context.

                       Context context)
                throws LibraryInitException
